General.Name: Gresgying Digital Energy Technology Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Gresgying Digital Energy Technology Co.,Ltd produces and sells electricity in China. It also engages in the railway special line transportation business that operates railway special lines and freight yards. The company was formerly known as Shandong Jiangquan Industry Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Gresgying Digital Energy Technology Co.,Ltd in May 2022. Gresgying Digital Energy Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Linyi, China.

4.Name: Mr. Ying Hua Huang
4.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. of Thermal Power Branch
